reviews.text: Really great atmosphere and the food is amazing! Big portions and fantastic flavours. The decor was super and unexpected find on this quiet side road. Live music on the weekends!!

We had booked a table for 2 p.m.
I suppose that to feel the atmosphere of this place you'll have to wait till afternoon hours when there will be live music.
Service was very good, we didn't waited long for meals and for getting a check.
Food was very good, but you have to really like spicy meals because it was hard for me üòÖ
Overall I recommend this restaurant but you have to have in mind while making reservation, to chose good place for sitting.
Great atmosphere, large selection of dishes, super tasty food and very friendly staff. We'll be back on our next visit.

The atmosphere was amazing with beautiful live music.

The Service very fast and the waiter very professional.

Prices are ok.

I had a lovely dinner here, atmosphere was really nice, lots of big groups, and some live music of accordion and guitar with singing

I had the cheese in paprika? And a salad with falafel and seafood. I enjoyed both dishes, if it says it‚Äôs spicy, it‚Äôs spicy!

Lots of seating available inside, and other peoples food also looked great!

Would recommend for large groups of people especially
